strictSSL.description: Enabled by default, setting this option to false disables strict SSL. Passed to request package. Useful behind (corporate) proxies that act like man-in-the middle on https connections.

proxy.description: Any standard http-proxy as supported by the request package.

token.description: The OAuth token can be used to boost the Github API rate-limit from 60 to 5000 (non-cached) requests per hour. The is token needs just 'read-only access to public information' so no additional OAuth scopes are necessary.
